headline: LYB to discuss third-quarter results Friday, Oct. 31, 2025
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, Oct. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB), a leader in the global chemical industry, will announce its third-quarter 2025 financial results before the U.S. market opens Friday, Oct. 31, followed by a webcast and teleconference to discuss the results at 11 a.m. EDT. Teleconference and webcast detailsFriday, October 31, 202511 a.m. EDTHosted by David Kinney, head of investor relationsAccess the webcast 10 to 15 minutes prior to the start of the call at www.ly
